'''L'Association Tolkiendil''' is a [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien society]] in France founded in [[2003]].<ref>http://www.tolkiendil.com/asso</ref> This non-profit organization is dedicated to promoting J.R.R. Tolkienâ€™s works in French-speaking countries.

==Publications==
Publications include ''[[L'Arc et le Heaume]]''. Tolkiendil organizes various Tolkien events and also attends Fantasy related events throughout the year.
